Title: Extends the pilot program to examine the effects of waiving the state civil service examination fee
Summary: Extends the pilot program to examine the effects of waiving the state civil service examination fee to December 31, 2027.
LawCode: Amd ยง50, Civ Serv L; amd Part EE ยง2, Chap 55 of 2023
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to extending the pilot program to examine the effects of waiving the state civil service examination fee; and to amend part EE of chapter 55 of the laws of 2023 amending the civil service law relating to waiving state civil service examination fees between July 1, 2023 and December 31, 2025, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
